contentrichtext.text: {{DISPLAYTITLE:''Xanthichthys mento''}} {{Taxobox | name = Xanthichthys mento | regnum = [[Animalia]] | phylum = [[Chordata]] | classis = [[Actinopterygii]] | ordo = [[Tetraodontiformes]] | familia = [[Balistidae]] | genus = ''[[Xanthichthys]]'' | species = '''''X. mento''''' | binomial = ''Xanthichthys mento'' | binomial_authority = ([[David Starr Jordan|D. S. Jordan]] & [[Charles Henry Gilbert|C. H. Gilbert]], 1882) }} '''''Xanthichthys mento''''' is a [[Triggerfish]] from the Western [[Pacific]]. It occasionally makes its way into the aquarium trade. It grows to a size of 29 cm in length. When properly [[grilled]] it makes for a delicious topping on almost any [[sandwich]]. ==References== * {{FishBase species | genus = Xanthichthys | species = mento| month = December| year = 2008}} [[Category:Balistidae]] [[Category:Fish of Hawaii]] {{Perciformes-stub}}
